title: Fully renovated 2 bedroom with private dog yard!
posting_body: ['The Huntington Apartments', '8223 W Floyd Ave, Lakewood, CO, 80227', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to The Huntington Apartments', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1010 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Huntington is located between Wadsworth and Kipling.', 'If you are coming from Denver just take highway 6th West Bound.', 'Exit Wadsworth South bound.', 'Turn West on W. Girton Ave.', 'Turn Left or South of S. Ammons St. Right or West on W. Floyd Ave.', 'The leasing office is located on the right hand side.', 'Features', '- Dishwashers', '- Wired for Technology', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heat', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- In Home Washer and Dryer', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- Oak Cabinetry', '- Newly Upgraded interiors', '- Cathedral Ceilings with Skylights*', '- Energy Star Appliances', '- Wood Burning Fireplaces', '- Linen Closets*', '- Designer Two-Tone Paint*', '- Personal Balcony or Patio*', '- Pet Yards*', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Packages*', 'Community Amenities', '- Access to Walking and Biking Paths', '- Breathtaking Mountain Views', '- Convenient Access to I-25, E-470, I-70', '- Minutes from Red Rocks Amphitheatre', '- On-Site Laundry Facility', '- Business Center', '- Green Friendly Community', '- Carports', '- Adjoining Sister City Park', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Tennis Court', '- Basketball Court', '- Fitness Center', '- Community Grill', '- Fire Pit', '- Resort-Inspired Pool and Year-round Spa', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed', 'Comments: We welcome your furry friends here at The Huntington!', 'Max weight is not to exceed 80 lbs for both pets.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions do apply.', '4oSplNRbh']
